Comments_List: Very good overview of medical imaging and concepts. Gained solid foundation to pursue further learning in the desired imaging modality.

Very well organized, the instructors were always very helpful and the lectures were great. The guest lectures were also very helpful to learn about the current cutting edge technology and the direction of the research field.
Yes, it is a great introductory course to any student interested in any aspect of medical imaging.
